Status indicator

Status show a dot indicator, at various stages of the order process. Here we use different classes to display purchased, printing, dispatched, unknown and cancelled. The following classes can be applied to a span to show an order status:

  • .status-purchased
  • .status-printing
  • .status-dispatched
  • .status-unknown
  • .status-cancelled
